post.body: @chartjes personally, i see it as him being a jerk and wanting to get the rest of us sickly ;)
get @caseySoftware to breathe for you - he has plenty of free time ;)
nice
a misguided fan?
if one didn't know you, that would sound downright dirty
for you? Only the best foam covered bats!
my personal favorite - "release the penguins"
yes....i mean no!
the ELPH series are all nice (Canon)
grab a game and run!
strategery?
hmm...iget some of those too. Strange.
akismet for the win?
you women and those wiles! We have no defense!
clogged up coworker: "man, I almost didn't come in today" me: "then why did you?" *blank stare*
Relax and remember rule #1 :)
Mmmm foggy
Back in to work today, just the chest congestion left
Heading to bed, hopefully back to somewhat normal tomorrow.
man, Eve is really trying to suck me back in (and large parts of my life away)
well, the congestion is much better but the cough has firmly planted itself in my chest
Taking more cough medicine...wish it helped longer.
oh, and in a winxp VM
komodo + samba share +vpn == pokey
bah, locked myself out of my work account from home. let the 15 min countdown begin...
wokring *cough* at home *cough* today. guh.
Guh, up at 5am coughing
aww...Mary Poppins
poor little mac, sitting outside in subzero temps for hours.
Hmm...the oaked Arrogant Bastard isn't that much different than the normal stuff. Hopefully the Stone Smoked Porter won't disappoint.
headed home a bit early....hard to focus
hmm... /me tries to remember if he did everything he should have last night
one of those feelin' funny in the head days...
i'm pushing the limits of this plastic knife trying to cut this lunch....
hmm...about 2200 posts this past year.
*ponders registering isthatconferenceshceduleup.com*
I wonder what a world without disclaimers would be like...
ugh, back to work i go...
another advantage of the new TV in the living room? old one goes to our bedroom - woo!
My son is a dancin' fool...
